name: The Ten Second Games
description:
Welcome to the Ten Second Games! The largest competition of time counters across the known realm.

This year is set to be a special one, as the Emperor has sent a special guest to observe the proceedings.

Good luck in the games, and may your counting be true.

Made in Löve2D with the following tools

  • Paint.net
  • notepad++
  • vscode
  •  Audacity

By:

  • Andrew Wilson - Programming, Writing, Art
  • Steven Hart - Art, Audio, Programming

Sounds:

  • mixed_drums - wolfdoctor
  • middle_ages_warcry_2 - joelcarrsound
  • epic_tribal_drums - mattc90
  • horn_002 - freefire66
  • ambience(english summer) - georgehopkins
  • fruit_impact_2 - owlstorm

Sprites:

inspired by GRAMAN
